origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'ChainlinkAPI.fetch_articles', 'description': 'This function retrieves articles related to a specific topic within a given duration.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The topic of interest, e.g., Chainlink.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the articles, e.g., 1 week.'}, {'name': 'count', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of articles to retrieve.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of articles related to the topic.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 ChainlinkAPI.fetch_articles, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'Chainlink', 'duration'是'1 week', 'count'是'5'.
